aws:requesttag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the presence of tag key-value pairs in the request

aws:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by tag key-value pairs attached to the resource

aws:tagkeys.description: Filters access by the presence of tag keys in the request

imagebuilder:createdresourcetag/<key>.description: Filters access by the tag key-value pairs attached to the resource created by Image Builder

imagebuilder:createdresourcetagkeys.description: Filters access by the presence of tag keys in the request

imagebuilder:ec2metadatahttptokens.description: Filters access by the EC2 Instance Metadata HTTP Token Requirement specified in the request

imagebuilder:lifecyclepolicyresourcetype.description: Filters access by the Lifecycle Policy Resource Type specified in the request

imagebuilder:statustopicarn.description: Filters access by the SNS Topic Arn in the request to which terminal state notifications will be published
